sentences.sentence: Biological microcircuits are roughly essentially the same in all mammals.
sentences.translation: 而生物电路是粗糙的，本质上所有哺乳动物都有类似的结构。

sentences.sentence: Known, however, that the discussion deals with one of the most important producers of microcircuits.
sentences.translation: 众所周知，然而，讨论涉及其中一项最重要的生产者的微电路。

sentences.sentence: However, until it communicates, when on the market appear the first microcircuits with the logotype Fujitsu.
sentences.translation: 然而，直到它沟通，当在市场上出现的第一个微电路与富士通标识。
